tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rl_state_action_pairs (
    state_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    action_id UUID NOT NULL,
    reward DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    q_value DOUBLE NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE StateActionPairs (state_id INT, action_id INT, reward FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (state_id, action_id));
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentStates (state_id INT, state_description TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (state_id));

CREATE TABLE reward_history (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    state_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    reward_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE episode_history (
    episode_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_date DATE,
    total_reward FLOAT,
    steps_taken INT,
    agent_id INT
);
